original_title: Railway workers end strike; Operations to return to normalcy
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The strike action by railway trade unions was suspended on Monday (24) evening.
All railway operations scheduled for Monday (24) evening will be restored, said Sri Lanka Railways.
Railway Power-Set workers said that they decided to engage in a trade union action, citing multiple demands, including the slashing of overtime payments, and delayed promotions.
Court prevents protest in Fort; Trade Unions continue protest despite rainfall
Newsline | Non Essential Imports must be curbed | Prof. Lalithasiri Gunaruwan | 24th July 2023
